item.title: 35mm Pinhole Camera
item.description: How I made it: Link to heading The humble beginnings Link to heading I picked up a couple of baking trays for the total price of 3 quid - very good value I must say! Initial body cut Link to heading You can cut through these trays with a good pair of scissors. Marking out the pinhole Link to heading My very shoddy metalwork Link to heading The task of creating a hole in the middle of a sheet of aluminium without the aid of power tools was rather difficult.
